entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Burk's Falls
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 08:54 AM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Flurries at times heavy. High zero with temperature falling to minus 4 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Flurries at times heavy beginning this morning. Local amount 5 cm. Wind becoming west 40 km/h gusting to 60 this afternoon. High zero with temperature falling to minus 4 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 11 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this evening. Clearing before morning. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light this evening. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023
